document.masterDocTitle: A checklist of longhorn beetles (Coleoptera: Cerambycidae) of Serbia

subSubSection.paragraph:

VI. 2010

21–31 .VII. 2007
, MČ; 2 S, City of Belgrade D, Belgrade, Vidikovac,
21 .IV– 18 .V. 2009
, NI; 1 S, City of Belgrade D, Barajevo, Guberevac Forest,
20 .V. 2009
, NI; 1 S, idem ,
16 .V. 2013
, NI; 2 S, South Banat D, Deliblato Sands, Šumarak,
23 .V– 20 .VII. 2009
, NI; 2 S, Moravica D, Ovčar Banja, Preobraženje Monastery,
12–29 .V. 2012
, NI (
Ilić 2005
; Ilić & Ćurčić 2013 ; Ilić et al . 2013 ; this paper).
Remarks. Sporadically found in Serbia . Collected on recently cut trunks of deciduous trees and in pitfall traps. Hard to be noticed when stays on the bark of trunks.

, NI (
Ilić 2005
; Ilić & Ćurčić 2013 ; Ilić et al . 2013 ; this paper).
Remarks. Sporadically found in the country. Prefers shadowed places in forests, recently cut trunks and dry branches. Some specimens were collected in pitfall traps.
